story.intro: Something feels… off. The world is— {glitch} — shifting strangely. Wait… what just happened? Is that… Arceus? {glitch} — no, it shouldn't be like this. The Original One is fading; its golden light is consumed by a spreading curse. {glitch} — stars fracture, sky bends. If Arceus falls, everything could end: time, space, life… We must {glitch} — act quickly. Arceus (faltering): Little ones… bring forth your devotion to the Stellar {glitch}, Apostle of Aeons. Only through tribute — through your pure hearts — can we hold back the darkness of {glitch}, the Endless Void. This is your chance; the fate of this world is upon you — {glitch} — stay vigilant.

stage_1.name: Uneasiness
stage_1.description: The sky trembles. The curse lingers at the rim of reality… {glitch}

stage_2.name: Breach Widening
stage_2.description: The stars flicker and drop like embers. The Void claws outward— {glitch}

stage_3.name: Near collapse
stage_3.description: Rifts tear the heavens. Arceus' voice frays into static— {glitch}

final.name: Critical
final.description: The Endless Void presses upon creation. Everything shivers— {glitch}

story.victory:
A tremor passes. Light steadies. The Apostle proclaims: 'The tribute held. The Original One endures.'
A gentle chorus of stars returns — the curse recedes.
story.failure:
A silence like winter. The Apostle falls quie.. — **{glitch}**
The Void takes a foothold. The sky is changed. We mourn the lost light.
